query: I have the Standard plan in the image below, and I just uploaded 60 equally sized files and got a message that I'm 100GB over the limit. I have 980 more files of the same size to upload. What is the average additional cost per file in dollar that goes over my current plan limit rounded to the nearest cent if I have to upgrade to the minimum possible plan to store them all? Answer with the following format: x.xx

tasks.description: извлечь информацию о текущем лимите и стоимости плана из изображения
вычислить общий размер загружаемых файлов и необходимый объем хранилища
определить, какой план необходимо выбрать для хранения всех файлов

assumptions: The user needs to store a significant amount of files, but the exact amount of storage required is not specified.
reasoning_steps: The available plans are analyzed based on their storage capacity, number of users, linked devices, and file backup duration.
The Standard plan offers 2 TB of storage, which may be insufficient for larger file storage needs.
The Plus plan offers 10 TB of storage, which is more suitable for moderate storage requirements.
The Premium plan offers 50 TB of storage, which is ideal for extensive storage needs.
conclusions: If the user anticipates needing more than 2 TB of storage, the Standard plan is not suitable.
The Plus plan is a balanced option for moderate storage needs, while the Premium plan is best for extensive storage requirements.
proposed_answer_outline: Choose the Plus plan if moderate storage (up to 10 TB) is needed.
Choose the Premium plan if extensive storage (over 10 TB) is required.
follow_up_queries: What is the expected total storage requirement for the files?
How many users will need access to the storage?
How many devices will be linked to the storage?

tasks.description: вычислить дополнительную стоимость за файл, основываясь на новом плане
предоставить ответ пользователю с дополнительной стоимостью за файл
